programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Step into the spotlight with the bold, electrifying energy of "Your Idol." This playlist brings together K-pop’s most powerful performances, confidence-filled tracks, and songs that radiate main character energy. Whether you’re on stage or just vibing in your room, these songs will have you owning every moment. It's a celebration of fierce charisma, unapologetic ambition, and the dream of being the idol. (Track List: (G)I-DLE - OH MY GOD / ATEEZ - WONDERLAND / ITZY - In the morning / Monsta X - FANTASIA / GFRIEND - Sunrise / THE BOYZ - The Stealer / WJSN - UNNATURAL / Wanna One - Burn it up / KISS OF LIFE - Igloo / ENHYPEN - Blessed-Cursed / tripleS - Girls Never Die / P1Harmony - End It / EVERGLOW - DUN DUN / Monsta X - DRAMARAMA / TWICE - FANCY / BTS - Blood Sweat & Tears / Dreamcatcher - JUSTICE / EXO - MOSTER / PURPLE KISS - memeM / Seventeen - Getting Closer / LE SSERAFIM - UNFORGIVEN / Stray Kids - Victory Song / Red Velvet - Peek-A-Boo / ATEEZ - I'm The One / GFRIEND - Apple / CIX - Jungle / NMIXX - O.O / Seventeen - CLAP / (G)I-DLE - HANN / THE BOYZ - REVEAL / ITZY - WANNABE / Stray Kids - Thunderous / aespa - Drama / BTS - MIC Drop / TWICE - I CAN'T STOP ME)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Refresh your day with the bubbly, feel-good vibes of "Soda Pop." Bursting with sweet melodies, playful beats, and a splash of retro charm, this playlist captures the brighter, cuter side of K-pop. Perfect for dance breaks, sunshine strolls, or just boosting your mood. Let these fizzy tunes pop some joy into your world! (Track List: ITZY - ICY / ONF - Popping / (G)I-DLE - Queencard / EVNNE - Badder Love / TWICE - MORE & MORE / EPEX - Youth2Youth / Red Velvet - Power Up / Billlie - EUNOIA / ENHYPEN - Tamed-Dashed / RESCENE - LOVE ATTACK / THE BOYZ - THRILL RIDE / JOYURI - Love Shhh! / NMIXX - Roller Coaster / NCT WISH - Songbird / fromis_9 - Stay This Way / CRAVITY - Adrenaline / OH MY GIRL - Summer Comes / LABOUM - Hwi hwi / BOYNEXTDOOR - Earth, Wind & Fire / YENA - SMILEY / NCT DREAM - Beatbox / H1-KEY - Summer Was You / TWS - Countdown! / STAYC - Bubble / ZEROBASEONE - Feel the POP / WJSN - Happy / KISS OF LIFE - Sticky / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Blue Orangeade / CHUNG HA - Sparkling / Kep1er - UP! / KARD - Hola Hola)
